name: 16.1.2 - Number of total conflict-related deaths, by sex, age and cause of death (Number) - VC_DTH_TOTN - All age ranges or no breaks by age - Incendiary; Chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear (CBRN); Electromagnetic weapons; Less lethal weapons; Denial of access to/ destruction of objects indispensable to survival; Accidents related to conflict; Use of objects and other means; Multiple Weapons Used. - Both sexes

source.additionalInfo: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) dataset is the primary collection of data tracking progress towards the SDG indicators, compiled from officially-recognized international sources.
